summary: This document is an email exchange between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing a book that has caused some distress. The communication is marked as confidential and may contain attorney-client privileged information.

keyFacts: The email exchange occurred on July 25 and 26, 2010.
Jeffrey Epstein invited Jes Staley to visit him.
The communication is marked as confidential and may contain attorney-client privileged information.
